duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide comprehensive patient-centered physical therapy care in coordination with physicians and patient care team.
Conduct patient assessments and develop individualized care plans focusing on goal achievement and positive patient experience.
Provide purposeful and skilled therapeutic care at patient's home, consistent with the physician's plan of care.
Instruct patients, families, and caregivers in the use of therapies, exercises, and therapeutic appliances.
Prioritize caseload, determine daily staffing needs, and coordinate assignments/handoffs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Physical Therapy (Master's preferred)
